content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 5, Atlético de Madrid 0.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 5, Atlético de Madrid 0.
Goal!  Barcelona 5, Atlético de Madrid 0. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left to the centre of the goal. Assisted by David Villa with a through ball.
Attempt missed. Antonio López (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.
Foul by Javier Mascherano (Barcelona).
Falcao (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Attempt missed. Gabi (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
Attempt saved. Adrián López (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Diego with a through ball.
